<small>Aramaic form: **<big>[[H5758|עִוְיָא]]</big>**</small>
 I. [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עָוָה‎</span>] **verb** ==bend, twist== (so Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">); — 

**Niph\`al** ***Perfect*** 1 singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נַעֲוֵיתִי‎</span> [[Isa.21.3|Isa 21:3]]; [[Ps.38.7|Ps 38:7]] ***Participle*** construct <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נַעֲוֵה‎</span> [[Prov.12.8|Prov 12:8]] feminine construct <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נַעֲוַת‎</span> [[1Sam.20.30|1Sam 20:30]] (but read <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נַעֲרַת‎</span> [[BDB#Sept|ᵐ5]] [[BDB#We|We]] [[BDB#Dr|Dr]] [[BDB#SS|SS]] [[BDB#Bu|Bu]] [[BDB#HPS|HPS]]); — ***be bent, bowed down, twisted***, \|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׁחה‎</span> [[Ps.38.7|Ps 38:7]] \|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נבהל‎</span> [[Isa.21.3|Isa 21:3]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נַעֲוֵה לֵב‎</span> [[Prov.12.8|Prov 12:8]] ***one perverted of mind***. **Pi\`el** ***Perfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עִוָּה‎</span>, subject <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span>: — [[Lam.3.9|Lam 3:9]] my paths ***hath he twisted***; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְע‎</span> [[Isa.24.1|Isa 24:1]] ***its surface will he distort*** (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בּוֺקֵק הָאָרֶץ‎</span>). **Hiph\`il** ***Perfect*** 1 singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יָשָׁר הֶעֱוֵיתִי‎</span> [[Job.33.27|Job 33:27]] ***the right have I perverted*** (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חָטָא‎</span>); so 3 plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הֶעֱווּ אֶתדַּֿרְכָּם‎</span> [[Jer.3.21|Jer 3:21]]. 



 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עָוָה‎</span>] **verb denominative** ([[BDB#Gerber|Gerber]]<sup>90</sup>) ==commit iniquity, do wrong== (Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎עוי‎</span> ***commit sin***, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֲוָיָא‎</span> ***sin***, compare [[BDB#Levy|Levy]]<sup>NHWB iii. 626</sup>); — 

**Qal** (late) ***Perfect*** 3 feminine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עָֽוְתָה‎</span> [[Esth.1.16|Esth 1:16]] ***she hath done wrong*** (with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַל‎</span>); 1 plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עָוִינוּ‎</span> [[Dan.9.5|Dan 9:5]] ***we have committed iniquity*** (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חָטָא‎</span>). **Hiph\`il** ***commit inquity***; — ***Perfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הֶעֱוָה‎</span> [[2Sam.19.20|2Sam 19:20]], 1 singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הֶעֱוֵיתִי‎</span> [[2Sam.24.17|2Sam 24:17]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חָטָא‎</span>); 1 plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הֶעֱוִינוּ‎</span> [[1Kgs.8.47|1Kgs 8:47]] = [[2Chr.6.37|2Chr 6:37]]; [[Ps.106.6|Ps 106:6]] (all \|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חָטָא‎</span>); ***Infinitive absolute*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַעֲוֵה‎</span> [[Jer.9.4|Jer 9:4]] ***construct*** suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַעֲוֺתוֺ‎</span> [[2Sam.7.14|2Sam 7:14]]. — [[Job.33.27|Job 33:27]] see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עָוָה‎</span>.
